meanings.definition: Of or relating to an artistic style characterized by elaborate ornamentation and asymmetrical designs.
meanings.sent1: The rococos painting featured intricate details and fancy patterns.
meanings.sent2: Her living room was decorated in a rococos style with lots of fancy decorations.
meanings.sent3: The rococos design on the cake was so elaborate that it looked almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The rococos architecture of the building was like a beautiful, intricate puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The rococos patterns on the fabric made it look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: Elaborate or excessively ornate in style or decoration.
meanings.sent1: The rococos chandelier in the ballroom was dazzling with its many crystals.
meanings.sent2: The rococos furniture in the room was so ornate that it almost seemed too fancy.
meanings.sent3: She wore a rococos dress to the party, and everyone admired its intricate details.
meanings.sent4: The rococos garden was like a fairy tale come to life with its elaborate decorations.
meanings.sent5: The rococos design of the palace made it stand out as a symbol of luxury and excess.
